front.title: Internet of things (IoT) cybersecurity colloquium: a NIST workshop proceedings

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: This report provides an overview of the topics discussed at the "Internet of Things (IoT) Cybersecurity Colloquium" hosted on NIST's campus in Gaithersburg, Maryland on October 19, 2017. It summarizes key takeaways from the presentations and discussions. Further, it provides information on potential next steps for the NIST Cybersecurity for IoT Program.

seriesInfo.name: NISTIR; NIST IR; NIST interagency report; NIST internal report
